ComicInfo.Summary:
A new arc begins in the radical reimagining of the classic sci-fi anime - join the build-up to a brand new event that will tear time and space asunder, as Robotechnology runs wild! Twists and turns from writer Simon Furman (Transformers) with mecha combat from Hendry Prasetya (Power Rangers!) As the wounded SDF-1 drifts above Earth and the fleeing Zentraedi swear revenge, Zand's mad experiments unleash chaos in the ranks!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Jeff Spokes | 1 | B | Action Figure Cover B (Spy Box Set [Bron/Rico/Konda] - Zentraedi Enemy) | Blair Shedd | 2 | C | Cover C | Waltrip Bros | 3 |
